1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Say '...'
4. See error

A clear description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
What actually happened instead.

If applicable, add screenshots or paste relevant console logs.

- **OS**: [e.g. Windows 11, macOS 14.3, Ubuntu 22.04]
